title: Unix Commands / Shortcuts
content:
| Shortcut  | Command |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| Ctrl+L  | Clear Screen  |
| Ctrl+R  | Reverse-i Search  |

More:
* [https://skorks.com/2009/09/bash-shortcuts-for-maximum-productivity/](https://skorks.com/2009/09/bash-shortcuts-for-maximum-productivity/)

View a file:
* <file.txt
* more file.txt
* tail file.txt
* cat file.txt

Search a file
* <file.txt grep searchquery
* grep searchquery file.txt
* cat file.txt | grep searchquery

Write to a file:
* echo "Content of file" > file.txt

Multiline:
```
cat << EOF > file.txt
First line of file
Second line of file
Wow multiple lines, sweet
EOF
```

Linking:
* ln -s <link_source> <link_destination)

Permissions:
* sudo chown -R $(whoami) /usr/local/lib

Sending files remotely
* scp
* rsync

View processes / Task Manager
- ps -ef
- uptime
- top
- htop
- free -m

System info
- cat /proc/cpuinfo

Disk space
* df -h
* du -h

Generating SSH Key
* ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "your_email@example.com"
* eval $(ssh-agent -s)
* ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa

Multiple sessions / Tabs / Split pane
* [tmux](https://www.jbernier.com/tmux)

Help
* man [command]

Tools
* [https://www.wezm.net/technical/2019/10/useful-command-line-tools/](https://www.wezm.net/technical/2019/10/useful-command-line-tools/)
